attributes.additional_details: It is time to put the power back in the hands of the electorate. We are going through a cost of living crisis, there is war close to us, we have lived through a pandemic and Brexit. It is time we are able to influence politics and say who we would like to represent us. We deserve a choice rather than another candidate stepping forward from the party that is currently in control. We have been under the same party leadership for a long time. It is time for a general election.
attributes.background: It is time we had a general election, as a nation we have lived through a pandemic, Brexit, there is now a war in Europe. All of these events have taken place under the same government, in such a turbulent time we should be given a general election to choose who we want to represent us.
